summary.para: Gets a bit field of flags that indicates which debug features are on or off.

returns.para: Mask of feature-mask flags, as a bitwise OR'ed combination of enumeration constants. If a flag is present, then that feature will be set to on, otherwise the feature will be set to off.

summary.para: Reports information about a device object's lifetime.

param.name: Flags
param.para: A value from the enumeration. This method uses the value in Flags to determine the amount of information to report about a device object's lifetime.

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes. HRESULT

summary.para: Set a bit field of flags that will turn debug features on and off.

param.name: Mask
param.para: Feature-mask flags, as a bitwise-OR'd combination of enumeration constants. If a flag is present, that feature will be set to on; otherwise, the feature will be set to off.

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes. HRESULT
